info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 8:05AM CDT until March 30 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... East central Morris County in northeastern Texas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 804 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rocky Branch to Hughes Springs to Jenkins, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hughes Springs, Redwater, Douglassville, Marietta and Bryans Mill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas.
